alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 12:08AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns and central Clay Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1208 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green Cove Springs, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Middleburg, Fleming Island, Switzerland, Lakeside, Penney Farms and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay
